collection_holder_name: C.L. Sonnichsen Library Special Collections Department, University of Texas-El Paso
pageContext.collection_title: S.L.A. (Samuel Lyman Atwood, a.k.a. Slam) Marshall Papers
pageContext.collection_description: Personal and professional papers of a military historian and commentator, including transcripts of radio broadcasts, 1940-1942, some 1951 and others after 1965. Program dates are listed but not names of programs.
